p: The differentiated DCs and macrophages and immortalized MEFs were infected with indicated ZIKV strains at different MOI values (based on TCID 50 Vero E6 cell titers), as indicated in the figures. After 2 h of infection at +37 °C fresh media was added and the cells were incubated for different times depending on each experiment. Recombinant human IFN-β (Schering-Plough) was used at 10 or 100 IU/ml cencentrations to pretreat DCs or macrophages for 16 h before ZIKV infection. Infective Zika viruses were handled strictly under Biosafety Level (BSL) 3 laboratory conditions at the Finnish Institute for Health and Welfare (THL), Finland.
